body_html:
That sounds like a bug, saving numpy arrays should never lead to OOM on GPU, can you provide a reproducible case?

Returned numpy arrays are in fact linked with underlying TensorFlow tensors, see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/c/c_api.h#L53 . However, this linking doesn't make sense to do for GPU tensors, only for CPU tensors cc @alextp
